dmca.title: Catering Company Alleges Infringement (#1)
dmca.body:
The Kentners
[private], Georgetown, Ontario L7G 3H6
Georgetown: [private] 		Mississauga: [private]
Fax: [private]		Toll Free: [private]
	www.kentnerscatering.com

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Re: Notice of Infringement

Dear Google Customer Support Professionals,

Thc copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on
several pages at http://www.maravelas.com
In each instance, the text is white on a white background
and is a verbatim copy of the text on our corporate web page.
This includes unauthorized use of our company name.

The search query on each infringing page is "Kentners Catering"

Infringing webpage #1:
www.maravelas.com/funerals-catering.htm
contains text that has been copied from Kentners web page:
http://www.kentnerscatering.com/event_funeral.html 
Infringing text:
The Kentner's Social Catering Ltd - Events & Food - Funerals. EVENTS
- Funerals. Passing of a loved one is certainly a difficult time to have to
worry about the comfort of your guests.  Let the Kentners Social Catering,
Kentner's
Social Catering Ltd - Events: Organizing, Catering. EVENTS. et Kentners
Catering
help you organize and cater your next event! BACK | TOP OF PAGE (c)2000
Kentners
Social Catering Ltd.

Infringing webpage #2:

contains text that has been copied from Kentners web page:
www.maravelas.com/catering-for-theme-parties.htm
contains text that has been copied from Kentners web page
http://www.kentnerscatering.com/event_themap.html
Infringing text: 
Kentner's Social Catering Ltd - Events & Food: Theme Parties- If your event is a themed party - then give Kentners Catering a call and let our theme party planner help you.

Infringing webpage #3:
http://www.maravelas.com catering-for-theme-parties.html
contains text that has been copied from Kentners web page:
http://www.kentnerscatering.com/event_bbq.html
Infringing text:
The Kentner's Social Catering Ltd
